response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. Your acceptance would not only secure your place among the elite few who possess this extraordinary item but also allow us to foster a valuable relationship. Let's make this remarkable journey together.", "product_price": 750000}
